fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Convert someone into a Locust during the night. *Every Night.*

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Can talk with other Locusts during the night
- No restrictions, unless stated otherwise, as to whom can be converted to a Locust. Additionally, each Locust player may convert during the night.
- Cope, Seethe, and Mald

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Convert every living player into a Locust.
